title: Wheat Sowing Advisory
content: Begin preparation for wheat sowing. Ensure proper field preparation and seed treatment. Recommended varieties: HD-2967, HD-3086. Sowing should begin in November.

title: Rice Harvest Advisory
content: Rice crops are ready for harvest. Monitor weather conditions and harvest before any heavy rainfall. Ensure proper drying and storage.

title: Pest Management for Cotton
content: Monitor cotton crops for bollworm infestation. Apply recommended pesticides if pest count exceeds threshold. Use integrated pest management practices.

title: Sugarcane Irrigation Advisory
content: Maintain regular irrigation for sugarcane crop. Apply 4-5 cm water every 10-12 days. Avoid waterlogging in fields.

title: Soil Health Management
content: Test soil pH and nutrient levels. Apply organic manure and balanced fertilizers based on soil test results. Maintain soil health for better crop yield.
